All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bomb
the bombs placed by the player, their update, draw and animation
Collider
the linked boxes to the entities, the ones being checked for collision, contains also the basic methods of collision checking
DepthComparator
manages the order of the entities for the draw
Entity
the father class of all entities, their basic variables and methods: collision managing, interactions, direction sorting, images resizing
Flames
the flames fired by the senshiyan, their update, draw and animation
GameOver
the game over screen, its update and draw
GamePanel
core of the program, manages the speed of frame update, the level switching, the level creation and the sounds
HUD
the scoreboard on the top, its update, draw and animation
JBomberMan
main, creates the window, the gamePanel and calls its method gamePanel.start()
KeyHandler
manages the keyboard input
Password
the password screen, its update and draw
Player
the bomberman, its update, draw and animation
PowerUp
the hidden power ups, their update and draw
Puropen
the red helicopter enemies, their update, draw and animation
Senshiyan
the green tank enemies, their update, draw and animation
SoftWall
the destructible walls, their update, draw and animation
Sound
contains the sound library and the methods to play and stop both SE and music
Stage
the backgrounds for each stage, their building methods and draw
Title
the title screen, its update and draw
Tomb
created by the enemies when dying, updates the score and starts the animation of death
